overview: Katia Karalis is a simple typist in a newspaper but wants to be a journalist.  One day she learns from her director that Chris Back, a high profile dressmaker.  However, in order to provide him with a quiet holiday, he has presented his double to the hotel, and Katia, accompanied by Gregoris, a photographer who is in love with her, watches him everywhere, falling from gaffe to gaffe.  Ultimately, despite all the difficulties, they make the great journalistic success after they manage to get an interview with the real Chris Back, namely Christodoulos Baka.
title: Ένας Γαμπρός Πολλά Ελαφρύς
